name: board-club-app
description:
The Board Club App

An application designed to allow members of the board club to view boards, events, rental information, and general information about the club.

scripts.start_OLD: node ./server/server.js && cd client/ && npm run start
scripts.startAll: concurrently "cd server && npm start" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && npm start" "cd client && serve -s build"
scripts.build_OLD: cd client/ && npm install && npm run build
scripts.buildClient: cd client/ && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: concurrently "cd client/ && npm install && npm run build" "cd server && npm install"
